name: AI Code Reviewer
description: Automated code review with security analysis, performance optimization, and best practices.

skills.name: Security Analysis
skills.description: Identify security vulnerabilities and suggest fixes.
examples: Review this API handler for injection risks.
Find auth flaws in this code snippet.

skills.name: Performance Review
skills.description: Analyze code for performance bottlenecks and optimizations.
examples: Profile this function for slow paths.
Suggest performance improvements for this module.
